posts.content:
Hi,
Anyone know Darren at Woo4vans, or had issues with communication and no delivery of an order placed.

I have placed an order on the 29th May for Beech Veneer Plywood for my 1967 Split, todate apart from an automatic order reference number, no communication at all and no delivery.

Have sent numerous; emails, texts called the only number (which kicks into send a text only), facebook, twitter., ( and through his ebay account, where he is still sellling)...getting very frustrated
Ordered via creditcard....so may have to report to get my cash back ( would very much rather the panels, or some communication though)

Company is.....

Wood4vans,
Wykin,
Hinckley,
Leicestershire,
LE10 3EF

Lack of delivery and no comminication is causing me issues in getting the bus back on the road.


WARNING - WOULD THINK TWICE BEFORE PARTING WITH YOUR CASH.
MY ADVICE BE CAUTIOUS, AS MIGHT HAVE WENT BUST, BUT STILL TAKING THE CASH.
WILL KEEP YOU ALL INFORMED IF THINGS CHANGE ( VERY MUCH DOUBT IT THOUGH)

Thanks for any help.
Cheers
VWMO
How did you get on in the end?
Got no response at all from any method from Darren or Woodvans, however got my cash back from my credit card company without issue. Always pay by credit card
